thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Canadian Finance Minister Morneau Sees No Need for ‘Impulsive’ Policy

author: Paul Vieira
title: Canadian Finance Minister Morneau Sees No Need for ‘Impulsive’ Policy
text:
OTTAWA—Canadian Finance Minister Bill Morneau said Friday he has no plans to be “impulsive” in response to worries over the impact of sweeping U.S. tax cuts and the renegotiation of the North American Free Trade Agreement might have on investment in the country.
“The good news is the economy is in a strong position. It’s resilient,” Mr. Morneau told reporters in Toronto following a meeting with private-sector economists ahead of the Liberal government’s 2018 budget plan, set for unveiling on Feb. 27.
...
